text: The Honda BR-V is a Subcompact Crossover SUV made by Honda since 2016. == First Generation (2016-2021) == The Honda BR-V was shown at the 23rd Gaikindo Indonesia Auto Show in 2015. It shares its plataform with the Honda Brio and the Honda Mobilio and is the third car developed by Honda R&D; Asia-Pacific after the Honda Amaze and the Mobilio. It has a 1.5 liter VTEC petrol engine and a 1.5 liter turbo diesel engine with a 6-speed manual CVT transmission. It was facelifted in 2019. == Second Generation (2021-present) == The second generation was previewed by the N7X concept in May 2021. It was later revealed in September. It was also developed in Honda R&D; Asia-pacific. The car started being produced in December and was put on sale in Indonesia in January 2022, and also started being exported in March. The second generation BR-V has a 1.5 liter VTEC petrol engine, and like the previous gen, it also has a 6-speed manual CVT transmission. == Markets == The Honda BR-V is currently sold in Indonesia, Thailand, Brunei, Philipines, Vietnam, Pakistan (where the first gen is still made), Jamaica. South Africa, and Mexico. It was previously sold in India (where it was discontinued in 2020 due to weak sales and the BS6 emission standards), and Malaysia (since it was replaced by the Honda WR-V). == References == Category:Honda automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Honda BR-V
